subject: Add JWT to CompanionClient Requests
description:
Update connect() to include JWT as Sec-WebSocket-Protocol header for remote sessions, or X-Local-Dev header for local. Build proper HTTP upgrade request. Add url dependency.

Files:
- Modify: maestro-cli/src/claude/companion.rs
- Modify: maestro-cli/Cargo.toml

Expected: Build succeeds with JWT handshake
